name: ButterMan (1MB)
description:
This game is all about a man that is made of butter and his adventure in the food kingdom. Inspired by (a very popular) classic platform game, the controls are sure to feel familiar.

Find your way through carrots, popcorn, toast, tomatoes and more! Dozens of enemies.

Move around with double jump, ledge hanging and fireball power ups!

Features
  • 27 levels: 4 worlds with 4 bosses.
  • Double jump, ledge hanging and fireballs.
  • Gamepad support.
  • Keyboard support on Chromebooks. Supports Samsung DeX.
  • Available in 8 languages (English, Russian, Farsi, Hindi, Japanese, Chinese, French and Spanish)
  • Made with fun in mind.
  • Free to play
  • Also available on Apple Store and the Android Play store for free.
Controls
  • Plug in a controller and should work
  • Arrow keys (to move)
  • Spacebar to jump or double jump
  • CTRL - fireball
  • Z = zoom (not needed but play with it if the resolution is off) 
  • P = Pause
  • R = Restart
  • Use <ENTER> key in menus.
